title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the system displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: After entering all necessary details in the JAR packager, when pressing the 'Finish' button, the system displays an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: The system should not display an error message when creating a JAR file with unsaved editors. Instead, it should prompt the user to save the unsaved editors before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file and make changes without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project.
3. Enter all the required details, such as the path, destination, and name of the JAR packager.
4. Press the 'Finish' button.
